name: Social Control
description:
Only working on computer (no mobiles unfortunately).

Use Mouse to select items at the bottom and click on the screen to place them. More items will become available as you progress. There are 6 levels for now.

Music and sound effects from:

https://thewrongjohn.bandcamp.com/album/questions

https://thewrongjohn.bandcamp.com/album/the-wrong-samples
